titles.title: Disapproving a rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency relating to "Standards of Performance for New Stationary Sources and Emission Guidelines for Existing Sources: Sewage Sludge Incineration Units".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 5/11/2011--Introduced. Disapproves the rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) relating to Standards of Performance for New Stationary Sources and Emission Guidelines for Existing Sources: Sewage Sludge Incineration Units.
